name.$comment: The name of the data type.
name.description: The name of the data type. Determines the name of the page. Used for automatic cross-linking. String. Automated.

type.description: the type of the API (class, datatype, enum, global, library). Automated.

summary.$comment: Summary of the data type to appear in Script Editor Autocomplete.
summary.description: A single sentence overview of this data type. Used in hover menus and suggestions. String.

description.$comment: Full description of the data type to appear on the website.
description.description: A long description of how the data type operates. Markdown.

code_samples.description: A list of code samples for the data type. String list.

deprecation_message.description: Description of why the data type is deprecated and what to use instead.

constructors.description: A list of constructors. Table list.

name.description: The name of the constructor. String.

summary.description: A single sentence overview of the constructor. String.

description.description: A long description of the constructor. String.

code_samples.description: A list of code samples for the constructor. String list.

deprecation_message.description: Description of why the constructor is deprecated. String.

constants.description: A list of constants. Table list.

name.description: The name of the constant. String.

type.description: The data type of the constant. String.

summary.description: A single sentence overview of the constant. String.

description.description: A long description of the constant. String.

code_samples.description: A list of code samples for the constant. String list.

deprecation_message.description: Description of why the constant is deprecated. String.

properties.description: A list of properties. Table list.

name.description: The name of the property. String. Automated.

type.description: The data type of the property. string. Automated.

summary.description: A single sentence overview of the property. String.

description.description: A long description of the property. String.

code_samples.description: A list of code samples for the property. String list.

deprecation_message.description: Description of why the property is deprecated and what to use instead. String.

name.description: The name of the method. String. Automated.

summary.description: A single sentence overview of the method. String.

description.description: A long description of the method. String.

code_samples.description: A list of code samples for the method. String list.

deprecation_message.description: Description of why the method is deprecated and what to use instead. String.

name.description: The name of the function. String.

summary.description: A single sentence overview of the function. String.

description.description: A long description of the function. String.

code_samples.description: A list of code samples for the function. String list.

deprecation_message.description: Description of why the function is deprecated. String.

math_operations.description: A list of math operations. Table list.

summary.description: A single sentence overview of the math operation. String.

description.description: A long description of the math operation. String.

code_samples.description: A list of code samples for the math operation. String list.

__schema0.description: Tags for this item, such as Deprecated. String list. Automated.

__schema1.description: Parameters of this item. Each entry has the same keys. Table list. Automated.

name.description: Name of the parameter. String. Automated.

type.description: The datatype of the parameter. String. Automated.

default.description: The default value of the parameter. String, boolean, or number. Automated.

summary.description: A single sentence definition of the parameter. String.

__schema2.description: Returns of this item. Each entry has the same keys. Table list. Automated.

type.description: The datatype of the return. String. Automated.

summary.description: A single sentence definition of the return. String.
